channel.title: I need hel with a souce
channel.description: hi, i wana make my own server.. i downloaded the source "pimpscape" and opend it in winzip.. and wen i click "runserver" it just comes up with blak box for like 3 seconds.. then goes.. :(

item.title: I need hel with a souce
item.dc:creator: @fr33_2_pk fr33 2 pk
item.description:
@fr33_2_pk wrote:

nacho.man.mikesta:

Do you have JDK by any chance?

aah il try that … tnx

item.title: I need hel with a souce
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

[quote=“I Br3ndan I, post:2, topic:72749”]if(j > anInt891) { signlink.reporterror(aString1173 + " Too many players"); throw new RuntimeException("eek"); } anInt891 = 0; for(int l = 0; l < j; l++) { int i1 = anIntArray892[l]; Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub1_Sub2 class30_sub2_sub4_sub1_sub2 = aClass30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub1_Sub2Array890[i1]; int j1 = class30_sub2_sub2.method419(1, 0); if(j1 == 0) { anIntArray892[anInt891++] = i1; class30_sub2_sub4_sub1_sub2.anInt1537 = anInt1161; } else { int k1 = class30_sub2_sub2.method419(2, 0); if(k1 == 0) { anIntArray892[anInt891++] = i1; class30_sub2_sub4_sub1_sub2.anInt1537 = anInt1161; anIntArray894[anInt893++] = i1; } else if(k1 == 1) { anIntArray892[anInt891++] = i1; class30_sub2_sub4_sub1_sub2.anInt1537 = anInt1161; int l1 = class30_sub2_sub2.method419(3, 0); class30_sub2_sub4_sub1_sub2.method448(false, (byte)20, l1); int j2 = class30_sub2_sub2.method419(1, 0); if(j2 == 1) anIntArray894[anInt893++] = i1; } else if(k1 == 2)

Mmm? I own huh?[/quote] what exatcly does this do lawl?

right click the runserver.bat and rename it to…“Compile&Run By Dell”, then right click it again and click edit, a notepad will come up, replace everything in there with this…

@echo off COLOR 09 title Pimpscape Source "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java" server pause
Change the “06” to the type of java you have…

nacho.man.mikesta:

Do you have JDK by any chance?

Everyone has “jdk”(Java), but not the latest they have to download it…

Read full topic
